CodeIssue.Title: Potential XSS
CodeIssue.Description: The application appears to reflect data to the screen with no apparent validation or sanitisation. It was not clear if this variable is controlled by the user.
CodeIssue.CodeLine: echo " " . ucfirst(($_SESSION['user'])) . " ";

CodeIssue.Title: Potential SQL Injection
CodeIssue.Description: The application appears to allow SQL injection via dynamic SQL statements.

CodeIssue.Title: Variable Used as FileName
CodeIssue.Description: The application appears to use a variable name in order to define a filename used by the application. It is unclear whether this variable can be controlled by the user - carry out a manual inspection to confirm.
